questions.question_text: Bhagwānnu je ek _____ darshan te upar anant koṭi brahmānḍnā je viṣhaysukh chhe te sarvene vārīferīne nākhī deīe ane Bhagwānnā ek rommā jeṭalu sukh rahyu chhe teṭalu sukh jo anant koṭi brahmānḍnā viṣhaysukh bheḷā karīe to paṇ tenā koṭimā bhāgnī barobar paṇ thāy nahī.
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Vachanamrut Sārangpur 1.

questions.question_text: Viṣhaynu je sukh chhe te karatā ātmānu sukh bahu adhik chhe ne te karatā Bhagwānnu sukh e to chintāmaṇi chhe.
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Swamini Vato 1/26.

questions.question_text: _____ rūpiyā kharachtā paṇ āvā Sādhu maḷe nahi ne _____ rūpiyā detā paṇ ā vātu maḷe nahi ne karoḍ rūpiyā āpatā paṇ manuṣhya-deh maḷe nahi; ne āpaṇe paṇ karoḍ janma dharyā chhe, paṇ koī vakhat āvo jog maḷyo nathī. Nīkar shu karavā deh dharavo paḍe?
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Swamini Vato 1/19.

questions.question_text: Ā dehe Bhagwānne bhajī levā, ne deh to hamaṇā paḍashe, māṭe ā to vījaḷīnā zabakārāmā motī parovī levu, tem thoḍāmā kām kāḍhī levu.
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Swamini Vato 6/77.

questions.question_text: Karoḍ kām bagāḍīne paṇ ek mokṣha sudhārvo ne kadāpi karoḍ kām sudhāryā ne ek mokṣha bagāḍyo to temā shu karyu?
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Swamini Vato 1/14.

questions.question_text: Āpaṇe paṇ e _____ je mukta temanī panktimā bhaḷavu chhe ane Akṣhardhāmmā jaīne akhanḍ Bhagwānnī sevāmā hajūr rahevu chhe, paṇ nāshavant ne tuchchh evu je māyik sukh tene ichchhavu nathī ne emā koī ṭhekāṇe lobhāvu nathī.
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Vachanamrut Gadhada Pratham 21.

questions.question_text: “...marī to sarvene javu chhe paṇ āvī rīte bhakti karavī e ja jīvyāno moṭo lābh chhe...”
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Vachanamrut Gadhada Antya 30.

questions.question_text: Ā meḍiyu maḷī chhe ne sāru sāru khāvā maḷe chhe, ke mān maḷe chhe, ityādik manuṣhya dehnu faḷ nathī. Te to vimukhne paṇ maḷe chhe. Māṭe manuṣhya dehnu faḷ to sārāno sang ne _____ ṭaḷe, eṭalu ja chhe.
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Swamini Vato 2/19.

questions.question_text: Āpaṇo janma be vāt sādhavā sāru thayo chhe, temā ek Akṣharrūp thāvu, emā deh antarāyrūp chhe; ne bīju Bhagwānmā joḍāvu, temā sang anek prakārnā antarāyrūp chhe. E be khoṭ ṭaḷavī.
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Swamini Vato 4/99.

questions.question_text: Nāshvant ā deh vadhethi, avinashi fal levu ji, patrāvaane jemi karine, bahaar feki devu ji
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from a Kirtan by Narayandas Swami.

questions.question_text: “...ati sāche bhāve karīne satsang kare to tene koī jātno doṣh haiyāmā rahe nahī ane deh chhatā ja _____ thaī jāy.”
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Vachanamrut Sarangpur 9.

questions.question_text: “...jyāre āvo sant-samāgam prāpt thayo tyāre deh mūkīne jene pāmavā hatā te to deh chhatā ja maḷyā chhe; māṭe jene parampad kahīe, mokṣh kahīe tene chhate dehe ja pāmyo chhe.”
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Vachanamrut Gadhada Antya 2.

questions.question_text: Bhagwāne kahyu chhe je, “Jevo hu _____ karīne vash thāuchhu evo tap, yagna, yog, vrat, dānādik sādhane karīne paṇ vash nathī thāto.” Te satsang shu je, ‘Moṭā Ekāntikne hāth joḍavā ne te kahe tem karavu e ja chhe.’
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Swamini Vato 1/17.

questions.question_text: Jan pratye jīvan kahe, jene jeṭalo satsang; Tene teṭalā pāpno, thāy bāher bhītar bhang.
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Bhaktachintamani 84.

questions.question_text:
Aksharnā vāsī vahālo, āvyā avani par,
Navkhaṇḍ dharatīmā Swāmī, chhatrāyā chāle rāj… Akshar ṭek
Avani par āvī vahāle, satsang sthāpyo,
Hari janoṇe kol, kalyāṇno āpyo rāj… Akshar 1
Pānche vartamān pāḷe, bāīo ne bhāīo,
Hari jan sangāthe kīdhī sācī sagāīo rāj… Akshar 2
Bāīo dekhīne bhāīo, chheṭerā chāle,
Paḍī vastu koīnī, hāthe nav zhāle rāj… Akshar 3
Devnā Dev vahālo, dhāmnā Dhāmī,
Pragaṭ Prabhunu nām Sahajānand Swāmī rāj… Akshar 4
Premānandnā Swāmī ānandkārī,
Potānā jannī vāle lāaj vadhārī rāj… Akshar 5
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from a Kirtan by Sadguru Premanand Swami.

questions.question_text: “Ane satsangī paṇ ene ja kahīe; kem je, satyarūp evo je potāno ātmā tathā satyarūp evā je Bhagwān teno jene āvī rīte _____ thayo tene satsangī kahīe.”
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Vachanamrut Gadhada Antya 39.

questions.question_text: “Trīs lakṣhaṇe yukta evā je sant teno je sang te man-karma-vachane rākhe, to jeṭalā kalyāṇne arthe sādhan chhe teṭalā sarve tenā sangmā āvī jāy chhe.”
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Vachanamrut Vartal 4.

questions.question_text:
Sant samāgam kīje, ho nishdin… ṭek
Mān tajī santanke mukhse, prem sudhāras pīje… Ho 1
Antar kapaṭ meṭke apnā, le unku mann dīje… Ho 2
Bhav-dukh ṭaḷe baḷe sab duṣhkṛut, sabvidhi kāraj sījē… Ho 3
Kahe Brahmānand santkī sobat, janma suphal kar līje… Ho 4
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from a Kirtan by Sadguru Brahmanand Swami.

questions.question_text:
Sācho maḷyo chhe _____, ange achaḷ karī rākhjo re;
Rakhe chaḍe bījāno rang, evu ḍahāpaṇ dūr nākhjo re… ṭek
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Chosath Padi.

questions.question_text: “...jem ā līmbaḍānu vṛukṣh chhe te ek vār _____ chhe, pachhī koī rīte manmā sankalp thato nathī je, ‘Līmbaḍo hashe ke nahī hoy?’ Evī rīte game teno sang thāy ane game tevā shāstra sāmbhaḷe paṇ koī rīte karīne Bhagwānnā swarūpno je nishchay karyo hoy temāthī man ḍag-mage nahī, evo je nirutthānpaṇe Bhagwānno nishchay ene ame tadātmakpaṇu kahīe chhīe.”
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Vachanamrut Gadhada Madhya 14.
